TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Table extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class Table Inherits WebControl Implements IPostBackEventHandler
public ref class Table : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 在网页上显示表。

span.span: Displays a table on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控制可以生成一个 HTML 表并直接的方式指定其特征。The control allows you to build an HTML table and specify its characteristics in a straightforward manner. 可以在给定一些静态内容，但的强大的设计时生成表Web 服务器控件通常是实现时表以编程方式生成动态内容。A table can be built at design time given some static content, but the power of a Web server control is often realized when the table is built programmatically with dynamic contents. > [!NOTE] > 如果`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`的 Web.config 文件中的元素的属性设置为`3.5`，该控件呈现`border`属性设置为"0"上的 HTML`table`元素。If the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute of the element in the Web.config file is set to `3.5`, the control renders a `border` attribute that is set to "0" on the HTML `table` element. 请务必记住，任何以编程方式添加或修改的表行或单元格将不会保留在发往服务器之间。It is important to remember that any programmatic addition or modification of table rows or cells will not persist across posts to the server. 这是因为表行和单元格是自己的控件和不属性控件。This is because table rows and cells are controls of their own, and not properties of the control. 若要保存对表的任何更改，行和单元格必须可重新建立后每次回发。To persist any changes to the table, rows and cells must be reconstructed after each postback. 事实上，如果需要大幅修改，建议， ，或而不是使用控件控件。In fact, if substantial modifications are expected, it is recommended that a , , or control be used instead of the control. 因此，类主要由控件开发人员使用。As a result, the class is primarily used by control developers. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在设计时创建的表。The following code example demonstrates how to create a table at design time. 表包含两个单元格每两个行。The table contains two rows of two cells each. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Table Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Table Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式构造一个表。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a table programmatically. 动态创建表包含三个步骤。Creating a table dynamically consists of three steps. 首先，创建对象以表示行中的单元格。First, create objects to represent the cells in a row. 通过这两个设置添加的单元格的内容属性或通过将控件添加到集合。Content for the cells is added by either setting the property or by adding controls to the collection of the . 接下来，创建来表示表中的行。Next, create a to represent a row in the table. 添加前面创建的对象集合。Add the objects created earlier to the collection of the . 最后，添加到集合控件。Finally, add the to the collection of the control. 为表中每个行重复此过程。Repeat this process for each row in the table. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Table Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Table Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用插入适当的特性和样式到输出流控件。This method is used primarily by control developers to insert the appropriate attributes and styles into the output stream for a control. 此方法重写 。This method overrides . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写要添加到属性的自定义服务器控件中方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control to add an attribute to the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTableAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_table_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTableAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_table_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomTableAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_table_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomTableAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_table_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string BackImageUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string BackImageUrl
Public Overridable Property BackImageUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ BackImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件的后面显示的背景图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the background image to display behind the control.

value.span: 控件的背景图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the background image for the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的背景中显示的图像的位置控件。Use the property to specify the location of an image to display in the background of the control. 你可以使用相对或绝对 URL。You can use a relative or an absolute URL. 相对 URL 相关到网页或用户控件的位置的映像的位置，而无需在服务器上指定完整路径。A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page or user control without specifying a complete path on the server. 该路径是相对 Web 页的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 这使得更轻松地移动整个站点到另一个目录服务器上而无需更新于代码中的图像的路径。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the image in code. 绝对 URL 提供的完整路径，因此将站点移动到另一个目录时需要更新代码。An absolute URL provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code. > [!NOTE] > 如果图像是小于控件，它将平铺。If the image is smaller than the control, it will be tiled.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Caption { get; set; }
.property instance string Caption
Public Overridable Property Caption As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Caption { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件的 HTML 标题元素中呈现的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control.

summary.span: 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of Assistive Technology devices.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示要在 控件的 HTML 标题元素中呈现的文本。

span.span: A string that represents the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要呈现在一个 HTML 标题元素中的文本控件。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control. 你指定的文本提供了辅助技术设备可以用于以使控件更易于访问的表的说明。The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the table that can be used to make the control more accessible. 其他辅助支持控件由属性。Additional accessibility support for the control is provided by the property. 使用属性来指定 HTML 标题元素中的对齐方式控件。Use the property to specify the alignment of the HTML caption element in a control. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign CaptionAlign { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign CaptionAlign
Public Overridable Property CaptionAlign As TableCaptionAlign

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableCaptionAlign CaptionAlign { System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableCaptionAlign get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableCaptionAlign value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的 HTML 标题元素的水平或垂直位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control.

summary.span: 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of Assistive Technology devices.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定 HTML caption 元素中的水平或垂直位置控件。Use the property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control. 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of Assistive Technology devices. 此属性使用其中一个设置枚举值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置标题元素的对齐方式。The caption element's alignment is not set.| |`Top`|标题元素和表的顶部对齐。The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.| |`Bottom`|标题元素和表的底部对齐。The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.| |`Left`|Caption 元素与表的左侧对齐。The caption element is aligned with the left of the table.| |`Right`|Caption 元素与表的右侧对齐。The caption element is aligned with the right of the table.| 其他辅助支持控件由属性。Additional accessibility support for the control is provided by the property. 使用属性来指定要呈现在一个 HTML 标题元素中的文本控件。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control.

exception.span: 指定的类型不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The specified type is not one of the enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CellPadding { get; set; }
.property instance int32 CellPadding
Public Overridable Property CellPadding As Integer
public: virtual property int CellPadding { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，表示还未设置该属性。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that the property has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量添加到单元格的所有四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 同一列中的所有单元格控件具有相同的宽度。All cells in the same column of a control have the same width. 填充量应用于宽的单元格和列中的所有其他单元格有此单元格的宽度。The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column have this cell width. 同样，在同一行中的所有单元格具有高度相同。Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height. 填充量应用于行中最高的单元格和行中的所有其他单元格具有此单元格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row have this cell height. 不能指定单个单元格的大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CellSpacing { get; set; }
.property instance int32 CellSpacing
Public Overridable Property CellSpacing As Integer
public: virtual property int CellSpacing { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置单元格间的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.

value.span: 单元格之间的空间量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, between cells.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，表示还未设置该属性。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that the property has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制中的相邻单元格之间的间距控件。Use the property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in the control. 在垂直方向和水平应用此间距。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. 该单元格间距是整个表的统一。The cell spacing is uniform for the entire table. 不能指定每个行或列之间的单个单元格间距。Individual cell spacing between each row or column cannot be specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果将此属性设置为一个值大于 0 并设置属性到一个值，显示单元格边框，间隔显示相邻的单元格边框之间。If you set this property to a value greater than 0 and set the property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells. 在此情况下，属性控制的差异大小。In this situation, the property controls the size of the gap.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override System.Web.UI.ControlCollection CreateControlCollection ();

protected: override System::Web::UI::ControlCollection ^ CreateControlCollection();

summary.span: 创建新的 对象以保存当前 控件的 控件。

span.span: Creates a new object to hold the controls of the current control.

returns.span: 一个 对象，用来包含当前 控件的 控件。

span.span: A object to contain the controls of the current control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用此方法控件。This method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from a control. 此方法将替代基实现类。This method overrides the implementation for the base class. 有关控件，始终返回，只能包含控件的当前控件。For a control, the always returns a that can only contain controls of the current control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便它始终返回的新实例类。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns a new instance of the class for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTableCreateControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlCollection/CS/custom_table_createcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTableCreateControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlCollection/VB/custom_table_createcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomTableCreateControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlCollection/CS/custom_table_createcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomTableCreateControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlCollection/VB/custom_table_createcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个对定义 控件外观的属性集的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of a control.

returns.span: 一个对 对象的引用，该对象包含定义 控件外观的属性。

span.span: A reference to the object that contains the properties that define the appearance of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要由控件开发人员使用此方法，派生自定义控件从时类。This method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom control from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便它始终返回一个空为。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns an empty for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTableCreateControlStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlStyle/CS/custom_table_createcontrolstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTableCreateControlStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlStyle/VB/custom_table_createcontrolstylevb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomTableCreateControlStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlStyle/CS/custom_table_createcontrolstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomTableCreateControlStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCreateControlStyle/VB/custom_table_createcontrolstyle.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中显示的网格线型。

span.span: Gets or sets the grid line style to display in the control.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的单元格边框显示在控件。Use the property to specify which cell borders are displayed in the control. 下表列出了不同的网格线样式。The following table lists the different grid line styles. |网格线值GridLine value|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |`None`|显示无单元格边框。No cell borders are displayed.| |`Horizontal`|显示仅的水平单元格边框。Only the horizontal cell borders are displayed.| |`Vertical`|显示仅垂直的单元格边框。Only the vertical cell borders are displayed.| |`Both`|显示这两个水平和垂直的单元格边框。Both the horizontal and vertical cell borders are displayed.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的网格线样式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the grid line style. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Table.GridLines Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table.GridLines Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Table.GridLines Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table.GridLines Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件在页面上的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the control on the page.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的水平对齐方式页内的控件。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the control within the page. 下表列出了不同的水平对齐样式。The following table lists the different horizontal alignment styles. |HorizontalAlign 值HorizontalAlign value|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|水平对齐方式尚未设置控制。The horizontal alignment of the control has not been set.| |`Left`|控件是左对齐页面上。The control is left justified on the page.| |`Center`|控件居中的页上。The control is centered on the page.| |`Right`|控件将右对齐的页上。The control is right justified on the page.| |`Justify`|控件对齐页面的左侧和右侧边距。The control is aligned with both the left and right margins of the page.| ## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTableAlign#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableAlign/CS/custom_table_aligncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTableAlign#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableAlign/VB/custom_table_alignvb.aspx#1)]

protected: virtual void RaisePostBackEvent(System::String ^ argument);

span.span: Raises events for the control when a form is posted back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页的值传递`argument`参数方法。The page passes the value of the `argument` parameter to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用此方法控件。This method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from a control. 方法将呈现的开始标记控制，并呈现表标题和对齐方式的标记，如有必要。The method renders the opening tag for the control, and renders tags for the table caption and alignment, if necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用此方法控件。This method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from a control. 控件实现呈现的表。The control implements the to render the of the table. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便它始终将插入自定义标头行服务器控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always inserts a header row for a custom server control. summary.span: 获取 控件中行的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of rows in the control.

value.span: ，它包含 控件的 对象。

span.span: A that contains the objects in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要以编程方式管理集合中的对象控件。Use the collection to programmatically manage the objects in the control. A表示表中的行。A represents a row in the table. > [!NOTE] > 仅在以编程方式生成表时，它通常用于此属性。This property is normally used only when building tables programmatically. 在设计时，它设置通过声明开始和结束标记之间的对象控件。At design time, it is set by declaring objects between the opening and closing tags of the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用以编程方式构造表的集合。The following example demonstrates how use the collection to construct a table programmatically. 动态创建表包含三个步骤。Creating a table dynamically consists of three steps. 首先，创建对象以表示行中的单元格。First, create objects to represent the cells in a row. 通过这两个设置添加的单元格的内容属性或通过将控件添加到集合。Content for the cells is added by either setting the property or by adding controls to the collection of the . 接下来，创建来表示表中的行。Next, create a to represent a row in the table. 添加前面创建的对象集合。Add the objects created earlier to the collection of the . 最后，添加到集合控件。Finally, add the to the collection of the control. 为表中每个行重复此过程。Repeat this process for each row in the table. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an. aspx 扩展。aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Table Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Table Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Table Example/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示 ASP.NET 应的呈现方式 HTML 控件时控件被禁用。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 呈现`disabled`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 呈现`class`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，应使用方法来引发的事件控制当窗体回发到服务器。Typically, you should use the method to raise an event for the control when a form is posted back to the server. 此方法是显式接口成员的实现。This method is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定义用于引发的事件自定义实现对象，请重写成员。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for raising the event for a object, override the member.

para.span: 显式接口实现调用方法来引发事件时发送的数据已更改的控件。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to raise the event when posted data has changed for the control.
